title: Mountain + city views*, Free yoga classes for residents
posting_body: ['VIVA VERANDA.', 'WELCOME TO THE GOOD LIFE.', 'At Veranda, we deliver a premier location, impeccable design, gorgeous apartments, upgrades galore, larger-than-life amenities and exclusive resident perks.', 'It’s the best of downtown living – without the downtown price tag.', 'Check out our apartments today.', 'From expansive studios to downright huge three-bedroom layouts, we’re sure to have the perfect place for you to call ‘Viva Veranda!’', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 91', 'OR Text', '91', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our team.', 'Follow The Link', 'Below:', '<URL>', 'This is a Studio, 1 Bath, approximately 938 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Stainless steel appliances*', '- Black-on-black appliance package', '- Granite countertops in kitchen + baths', '- Custom cabinetry', '- Pendant lighting', '- Studio, one-, two- and three-bedroom apartments', '- Soaking tub with custom tile surround', '- Walk-in closets and ample storage', '- Tech shelves + USB ports', '- Private patio or balcony', '- Designer paint schemes', '- Front-loading full-size washer + dryer', '- Window treatments', '- Wired for high-speed Internet', '- Eco-friendly wood plank-style flooring', '- Programmable thermostat', '- Mountain + city views*', '- Glass tile accents*', '- Spacious, open layouts up to 1,300+ square feet', '* some apartments', 'Community Amenities', '- Dedicated dog park', '- Multi-media conference room', '- Social /catering kitchen', '- 24-hour Package concierge', '- Dog- and cat-friendly', '- Business Center', '- VINE Community Garden', '- 100% smoke-free living', '- Complimentary coffee bar', '- Outdoor kitchen with BBQ grills', '- Garage parking with direct access', '- The Nikko Rooftop Lounge', '- Rooftop deck with breathtaking mountain + city views', '- Decked-out gaming + party room', '- Free yoga classes for residents', '- Basketball court', '- Outdoor fire pit', "- Denver's only lazy river (heated year-around)", '- Yoga studio', '- Expansive 24-hour fitness studio', '- Free wi-fi in social areas', '- Club-quality cardio equipment with individual TVs', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:10:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Sunday:12:00PM-5:00PM', 'Veranda Highpointe', '6343 East Girard Place, Denver, CO, 80222', 'vb8vT2KO']
